0.1.name: wordpress/infolinks
0.1.description: InfoLink adds a Button to the Editor, so you can easy link words from your post to wikipedia, imdb (supports English/German/Espanol/Franais wiki and imdb) or any site searched by google. Just select a word or sentence and click on the button or chose a service from the menu. The Word will be automatically searched and infolink will select the most meaningful result. (with the option to edit them)
